attributes.action: allow benefit claims whilst training for new career
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People who have contributed to the tax system all working life and find themselves redundant due to the economic climate are unable to claim benefits as they choose to retrain. 
As a result to this decision they find that they are unable to claim any government assistance. 
So whilst trying to better themselves and reduce the number of unemployed though their own tenacity they find they are in the position of being unable to support their family and run the risk of losing their homes.
People who have been made redundant without a redundancy package and who wish to retrain should be given assistance until they earning again
